title: Watch the crazy ending of the Oscars - The Washington Post
text: Watch the crazy ending of the Oscars Please enable flash to watch this video. Sorry, this video is not available. Your browser does not currently support live streaming video. Play Video Live Video - Actor and award presenter Warren Beatty announced that "La La Land" won the Oscar for best picture. But the musical had not, in fact, won the award. "Moonlight" did. Watch the dramatic and confusing end to the awards show. ( ) RELATED LINKS - Actor and award presenter Warren Beatty announced that "La La Land" won the Oscar for best picture. But the musical had not, in fact, won the award. "Moonlight" did. Watch the dramatic and confusing end to the awards show.
